features: 【Cooling gel core】The Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion with a cooling gel core that uses high-quality, high-density memory foam and gel layer design to provide strong support. The gel design cools off the seat instantly and prevents heat accumulation after long sitting. This gel layer is particularly beneficial during hot summers, keeping you cool and comfortable while sitting.

【Most comfortable cushion】The orthopedic seat pillow of the Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion has a U-shaped design with a hollow center to reduce pressure on the tailbone/caudal vertebrae and promote healthy posture. This design reduces discomfort from prolonged sitting, making it the most comfortable cushion available. The non-slip rubber bottom and machine-washable zipper cover ensure easy cleaning and maintenance(Comes with two zippered covers).

【Multiple uses】The memory foam seat cushion is great for office chairs, gaming chairs, dining chairs, and wheelchairs. With its memory foam seat cushion and back adjustable handle, Seat cushion is easy to carry, transport and fix on any seat for outside usage, such as car seats, planes, trains, sports game bleachers, and travel. Its versatility makes it a must-have cushion for everyone.

【Amazing gift】The large size (18.11''x14.17''x3.15'') of the non-slip seat cushion fits all types of chairs, making it an excellent gift for anyone. It can relieve sciatica, arthritis, lower back, hip, spine, post-operative injury, or pregnancy pain, making it a thoughtful gift for anyone experiencing pain or discomfort while sitting.

【100% satisfaction guarantee】If the gel enhanced seat cushion has quality and transportation damage problems,you can enjoy unconditional return and refund serivce . Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. Customer satisfaction is on our top priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product made it easy to endure 2 hours of basketball on hard bleacher seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It absolutely helped relieve sciatica discomfort!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Memory Foam/Gel Seat Cushion w/ Carrying Strap- w/ Removable Soft Cover & Carrying Strap
reviews.reviewText: So, both the gel/foam cushion and the soft cover have carrying straps --the cover is removable & washable (it did fine in the reg. machine wash & air dry).If you have room/bars/space you can hook the carrying strap through the back of your chair so it remains in place.This cushion is more cushiony than a lot of other cushions I have tried, but it still isn't amazing.I use it with another similarly shaped cushion at the same time.I think the soft/plush cover is way better than others, and the anti-slip side works too.I think this will work for most people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I immediately put this on my work chair, and I comfortably sit on it every day for 8 hours a day. It's ver comfortable and I suffer from lower back pain because of scoliosis and 2 pregnancies. Sitting for an elongated period of time is usually very uncomfortable for me but I believe this has added a lot of support and relieved a lot of pain for me. Great quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, surprisingly cooling
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from tailbone pain whenever I sit for a while so I have, and have had, a lot of seat cushions. I think this is the nicest one to date. It came rolled up in a canvas bag and was rather difficult to get out. Once out, it was two parts - the cushion itself, with a carrying strap, and the cover, also with a carrying strap. The carrying strap on the cushion was not removable, so you have to be careful when putting the cover on that the strap is tucked into the hole in the back or it could be uncomfortable and/or damage the cover.The cover fits perfectly (a bit difficult to get on and zipper up; it helps to have an extra set of hands to assist) and it is nice to have a carrying strap. The cover can, of course, be removed and washed.The cushion itself is not terribly soft (which works for me but some people might like it softer). The first thing I noticed when I sat on it was that it did, indeed, feel cool/cold. I didn't know the "cooling gel core" in the title was anything more than just a selling tactic, but it is indeed surprisingly cool. I think this will be a nice feature when the hotter summer months come around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful for long term sitting.
reviews.reviewText: I am in my chair the majority of the day for work, and I needed some extra padding to keep things from getting sore. This pad delivers, but takes some getting used to. It takes it a minute to compress when you sit, so you will feel abnormally higher in your chair, but that soon goes away, and will have the extra pad for the long haul.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I've tried a seat cushion. I just started a job where I spend the majority of my time sitting in an office chair and by the afternoon the end of my tail bone starts to ache. This does the trick to take that ache away. I do have to get used to raising my bottom to get over the top of the cushion since it makes the seat so much higher, but after that it is super comfy. It came vacuumed sealed in a bag and once opened popped right up. It has it's own cover, that fits just right. The cushion and the cover each have a belt that ties around the chair. I am very pleased with this purchase.
